experience_length: Minimum of 3 years of experience in network administration
education_length: Associate or Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Network Administration, or a related field
duties: Manage and monitor network infrastructure to ensure high availability and performance.
Perform network troubleshooting and manage network security protocols.
Coordinate with IT teams to implement and support network upgrades and expansions.
selection: Preliminary technical assessment followed by an on-site interview with the IT team.
A practical exam on network troubleshooting may be required for final candidates.
notes: Occasional on-call duty required to address urgent network issues.
application_location: Send your resume and cover letter to [hr@company.com].
